alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:59PM CDT until July 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN VILAS AND NORTHEASTERN ONEIDA COUNTIES... At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crystal Lake Scout Reservation, or 9 miles southwest of Eagle River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crystal Lake Scout Reservation, Three Lakes, Sugar Camp and Clearwater Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
